## Steps You've Tried

- [ ] I've read the [Team Setup Guide](../../TEAM_SETUP.md)
- [ ] I verified I'm a member of the team
- [ ] I checked if the repository is under the organization (not personal account)
- [ ] I checked if my team has write access to the repository

## Additional Context

Add any other context about the problem here.

## Checklist for Repository Owners/Admins

- [ ] Verify repository is under organization account
- [ ] Check team has write access to repository
- [ ] Verify user is member of the appropriate team
- [ ] Check branch protection rules aren't blocking pushes
